text:
="preserve">Philippe André Eugène, Baron Bodson (2 November 1944 – 4 April 2020) was a Belgian businessman and politician. He was a member of the Belgian Senate from 1999 to 2003. In 1977, he started working for Glaverbel, where he would be the CEO from 1980 until 1989. From September 1989 until December 1998, he was a non-executive member of the board of directors of Fortis.
Bodson died 4 April 2020 from COVID-19 at the age of 75.
